BRICKWORK SOFTWARE | NEW YORK CITY | Position: Back End Rails Engineering Lead

Brickwork Software http://brickworksoftware.com/ is a startup changing the way customers engage with brick & mortar stores online. We are looking for exceptional senior software engineers to help us shape the product and the company while growing with us.

About you: A ‘T-shaped’ Ruby on Rails developer with a bias toward back end development, love of great products and clean code. As a key early hire, you will have a big impact on our codebase, engineering process and culture.

About us: We are a smart, efficient and fun team that has a great time working together in our Chinatown, NY office. Brickwork is funded, has a strong customer pipeline and is experiencing tremendous growth. NYC-based candidates welcome.

Get in touch at: work AT brickworksoftware.com with some links to where we can find out more about you and the best product you’ve recently discovered.
